hero.title: Focus on your business. Konty takes care of the rest.
hero.subtitle: A stable, reliable Point of Sale system you can count on - day after day.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Stability, simplicity, and support that help them run their business with peace of mind

t1.name: Dragan Milčić
t1.title: Dining room and kitchen work in perfect sync.
t1.quote: Waiter enters an order on the tablet, kitchen sees it immediately. When the dish is ready, waiter gets a notification – no waiting, no mistakes. Everything runs fast and precise, exactly as it should.

t2.name: Rajko Dobrosavljević
t2.title: New waiters learn the system in under an hour.
t2.quote: Konty is extremely intuitive – no confusing buttons or complications. This saves us time and money on training, and errors are minimized. Ideal solution for businesses with higher staff turnover.

t3.name: Vladimir Adžić
t3.title: Reception and restaurant now work as one.
t3.quote: We connected the hotel system with the restaurant – when a guest orders in the restaurant, the bill automatically links to their room. No paper, no errors. Integration works flawlessly and facilitates communication across the entire team.

t4.name: Vinko Milić
t4.title: Fast, simple, and reliable.
t4.quote: Since we do everything through apps these days, it was important that our checkout works flawlessly. Konty is easy to master and makes customer service fast and efficient. Highly recommend to anyone who wants to simplify their business.

clients.title: Our Clients
clients.description: More than 9,000 businesses count on Konty every day

getStarted.title: Get started in 48 hours
getStarted.description: Switching to Konty is quick and easy

step1.title: 15-Minute Call
step1.description: You tell us about your business and your needs. Based on that, we create a system tailored to you.

step2.title: Account Setup
step2.description: We create and configure your account. We transfer products, customers, and everything you need. You don’t do a thing.

step3.title: Installation and Staff Training
step3.description: Our team carries out the system installation and staff training at the agreed time.

step4.title: You’re Ready to Start
step4.description: You’re ready to go. Our team is available to you 24/7.

pricing.title: Simple, Fair Pricing. No hidden costs.
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Cancel whenever you want.

start.title: Starter
start.description: For small venues needing simple checkout.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: For restaurants needing more control and tracking.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: For larger operations needing advanced features.

start.title: Starter
start.description: For small shops needing simple checkout.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: For stores needing more control and tracking.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: For larger operations needing advanced features.

pricing.a1: We offer three tiers: Starter, Standard, and Premium with monthly billing. Each plan includes core POS features with additional capabilities at higher tiers.
pricing.a2: All plan prices include software updates, customer support, and cloud hosting. No setup fees or long-term contracts required.

features.title: Simple. Reliable. Ready to work.
features.description: Everything you need for stable sales and secure checkout, with an intuitive system anyone can start using quickly.

feat1.title: Sections and Tables
feat1.description: Manage tables across multiple sections. Get detailed overview of bills, server activities, POS terminal status, reports, and more.

feat2.title: Fast and Efficient Sales
feat2.description: Quick item selection through intuitive interface. Efficient billing and ordering with various cash and cashless payment methods, order printing to kitchen or bar printers, and more.

feat3.title: Administration
feat3.description: Advanced management of employees, items and inventory, suppliers, customers, receiving and shipping goods, etc. Precise reports and detailed insights into all segments of your business.

feat4.title: Advanced Reports
feat4.description: Comprehensive and precise reports you need to run your business. Enables accurate tracking of inventory, sales, revenue, and expenses.

feat5.title: Available Everywhere
feat5.description: Konty works on Web, Windows, and Android. 24/7, anywhere in the world, you have free remote access to your application.

feat6.title: Superior Customer Support
feat6.description: Our team is available 24/7. Fast and efficient customer support is the foundation of our business.

feat1.title: Fast and Efficient Sales
feat1.description: Quick search and selection of items by name, code, barcode (regular and weight-based). Detailed overview of receipts, employee activities, POS terminal status, reports, and more.

feat2.title: Administration
feat2.description: Advanced management of employees, items and inventory, suppliers, customers, receiving and shipping goods and other business processes.

feat3.title: Reports and Statistics
feat3.description: Precise and comprehensive reports that give you detailed insights into all segments of your business.

feat4.title: Inventory Management
feat4.description: Real-time stock tracking with automatic alerts when items are running low. Manage thousands of products with ease and optimize your inventory levels.

feat5.title: Available Everywhere
feat5.description: Konty works on Web, Windows, and Android. 24/7, anywhere in the world, you have free remote access to your application.

feat6.title: Superior Customer Support
feat6.description: Our team is available 24/7. Fast and efficient customer support is the foundation of our business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Konty POS system
faq.a1: Konty is a modern point-of-sale system that helps businesses digitize their operations. It enables sales tracking, inventory management, reporting, and compliance.
faq.a2: Yes, Konty works offline too. All data is stored locally and syncs automatically when you reconnect to the internet.
faq.a3: You can start in just 5 minutes! Sign up, add products, and start selling. No installation or special hardware required.
faq.a4: Yes, Konty is fully compliant with US tax regulations. Automatically generates compliant receipts and reports.
faq.a5: You get 30 days of free access to all features. No credit card required. After expiry, choose the plan that suits you.
faq.q2: Can I use Konty without internet?
faq.q3: How quickly can I start using it?
faq.q5: How does the free trial work?

t1.name: Miloš Marković
t1.title: Konty enables us to offer the best to our clients
t1.quote: Partnership with the Konty team has brought a new dimension to our business. The product quality and support we receive allow us to focus on what matters most - satisfied clients.

t2.name: Vladimir Adžić
t2.title: A stable and reliable solution for our clients
t2.quote: Konty has proven to be an extremely stable and reliable solution. Technical support is always there when we need it, and clients are satisfied with the system's functionality. That's the foundation of a good partnership.

faq.title: Partner FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about becoming a Konty partner
faq.q1: How do I become a Konty partner?
faq.a1: Simply fill out the contact form on this page and our partnership team will reach out to you within 24 hours to discuss the opportunity and next steps.
faq.q2: What are the requirements to become a partner?
faq.a2: We look for partners with experience in retail or hospitality technology, a proven sales track record, and the ability to provide local support to clients in your region.
faq.a3: Partners receive comprehensive technical, commercial, and marketing support including training, documentation, co-branded materials, dedicated support lines, and ongoing product updates.
faq.q4: How does the delivery process work?
faq.a4: After signing the partnership agreement and completing training, you'll have access to our partner portal, demo systems, and sales materials. Our team supports you throughout the sales and implementation process.
faq.a5: We offer competitive partner pricing with volume-based incentives. Specific terms are discussed during the partnership evaluation process and tailored to your market and capabilities.
